comments.author: John - Mormon Foodie
comments.content: Congrats, Michael! That's great. Here's hoping you make it through the second round.

comments.author: veggie wedgie
comments.content: The Anti-griddle Pudding Pop looks awesome! Good luck!

comments.author: Healthy Foods Blog
comments.content: You're presentation really looks great! Keep up the good work and I wish you all the best! You're good... I think you'll win. God bless!

comments.author: Janna
comments.content:
Stunning, and truly unique. I could eat the seseame tuile everyday as a cracker.

Congrats on the call-back!  We're rooting for you, and the Seattleites.

comments.author: DessertObsessed
comments.content: How gorgeous! Those pops must be delicious! Good luck to you!

comments.author: Janna
comments.content:
I'm very impressived by the turn-out of Seattle bloggers.  Thanks for asking about the Stash.  We just wrapped the Fancy Food show, and are busier than before.

Good luck(!) with the next dish, and round.

comments.author: Denise
comments.content: This is right up my alley! Your recipes are amazing. I am more inspired to make more vegetarian food now. Wish to see more desserts (:
